title: FTX Future Fund Academic Institution Capture Program
summary: SBF launches Future Fund with $100 million planned distribution to academic institutions, think tanks, and research organizations focused on EA cause areas. Program systematically captures academic discourse around AI safety, pandemic preparedness, and global catastrophic risks. Grants target elite universities including MIT, Stanford, Georgetown to embed EA ideology in academic research. Creates network of financially dependent researchers who provide intellectual legitimacy for SBF operations while deflecting regulatory scrutiny through charitable reputation.
